name: aa 2
description:
aa 2 is the "hello world" app for iPhones, iPads & iPods.

i.e. aa 2 is like snake 2 on an old brick phone, it's fundamental.

Handmade in Australia,
General Adaptive


If it's not published by General Adaptive Apps Pty Ltd - then it's not the authentic and original aa 2. Don't be fooled by clones and respect genuine content.
